pages.text: $(b)Magical Tools$() provide unique utilities beyond combat. Each has special abilities!
The $(violet)Healing Staff$() heals nearby players and entities.
The $(violet)Chisel$() cycles obelisk textures or breaks them for shards when shift-clicking.

pages.title: Metal Detector
pages.text: $(b)Metal Detector$()$(br2)Detects nearby ores and valuable blocks. Essential for mining!$(br2)$(violet)Right-click to scan for ores in your vicinity.$()
